nodes.text: In the final war of the larger, ancient Mandalorian conflict, a battle between the Jedi and the Mandalorian warlords caused a cataclysm that scorched much of the planet Mandalore's surface into lifeless white desert, uninhabitable outside of hermetically sealed dome cities.

The concept of a cataclysm devastating Mandalore was created as part of the backstory of the Mandalorian people as depicted in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars animated series. Within Star Wars Legends, this event was identified as the Mandalorian Excision, though this information is no longer considered canon.
